title: What are the courses in education technology? - Quora

response.answer_text: Another good course in technology was I.T and so on. students in the program have the opportunity to explore and improve their skills in the use of educational technologies@PerryOMurphy@gmail.comhttp://www.amazines.com/article_detail

The Elearning and Digital Cultures MOOC at the U. of Edinburgh has been very popular. We recently ran a student review of it at MOOC News and Reviews that raved about it. Something Familiar, Something Great: ELearning and Digital Cultures MOOC Review
